meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish made from ground chickpeas or fava beans formed into balls or patties and deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: I tried falafel for the first time at the new restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious falafel at home.
meanings.sent3: Why did the falafel go to school? To become a smart patty!
meanings.sent4: The falafel was a golden orb of delight on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried falafel filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A single ball or patty of falafel.
meanings.sent1: I ordered an extra falafel to go with my meal.
meanings.sent2: The falafel was perfectly crispy on the outside.
meanings.sent3: The lonely falafel rolled off the plate and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The falafel stood out like a flavorful gem among the other dishes.
meanings.sent5: I savored every bite of the savory falafel ball.
